item.title: 2023 01 19 LVM Minihowto
item.description:
parted /dev/sda resizepart 2 100% pvresize /dev/sda2 pvdisplay pvchange /dev/sda2
lvextend -l +100%FREE /dev/cl/root xfs_growfs /dev/cl/root

vgextend vg01 /dev/sdd resize2fs /dev/vg01/lv01

mkdir /data pvcreate /dev/sdb vgcreate data-vg /dev/sdb lvcreate -l+100%FREE -n data data-vg mkfs.xfs /dev/data-vg/data echo “/dev/mapper/data–vg-data /data xfs defaults 0 1” » /etc/fstab mount /data
